markdownRemark.html: Further on the distribution of Mancinelli's textbooks, see now my "Advertising or Fama? Local Markets for Schoolbooks in Sixteenth-century Italy," in Print Culture and Peripheries in Early Modern Europe, ed. by Benito Rial Costas (Leiden: Brill, 2013), 69-99, esp. 82-89.
